alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:09PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange County through 100 PM EDT... At 1209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montgomery, or near Walden, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walden, Gardnertown, Montgomery, Orange Lake, Washingtonville, Maybrook, Pine Bush, Circleville and Bullville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
